Title: Bioscopewala
Writer: Rabindranath Tagore (short story "Kabuliwala"), Deb Medhekar (screenplay), Radhika Anand (screenplay), Sunil Doshi (story), Deb Medhekar (story)
Actors: Danny Denzongpa, Geetanjali Thapa, Adil Hussain, Tisca Chopra
Plot: A woman meets her dead father's old friend, who was the operator of a Bioscope show that she loved in her childhood. Connecting India and Afghanistan, a story of love and cinema unfolds.
